data.what_is:
NEON-dX packages analytics, artificial intelligence and marketing automation for enterprises to do profitable customer engagement.

Learn about your customers, predict their needs and act in real time, building longer, deeper and more profitable relationships using NEON-dX. Derive deep customer insights and personalize every customer interaction across channels, in real-time and at scale gaining a unique competitive advantage.
data.product_description: NEON-dX packages analytics, artificial intelligence and marketing automation for enterprises to do profitable customer engagement.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about NEON-dX?
NEON-dX is one of the best marketing automation tools out there. Even though it is a new product, the analysis it provides is pretty top-notch. Compared to the other marketing tools out there, NEON-dX's 24/7 live chats, ROI tracking, marketing analysis, and social marketing are pretty convenient. It can even be customized according to our needs.

What do you dislike about NEON-dX?
Since NEON-dX uses real-time data, it takes some time to learn and analyze. It is pretty much doing a good job. I keep switching between MAC and windows. The only problem is that it is not available on MAC OS.

Recommendations to others considering NEON-dX:
It is one of the best marketing analysis tools out there. It is customizable and very easy to use.

What problems is NEON-dX solving and how is that benefiting you?
NEON-dX makes my job easier by performing all the marketing analysis, ROI Tracking, and also it provides 24/7 live support. It also provides mobile support and the APIs are customisible.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about NEON-dX?
Integrate with basic applications like Google Tag Manager and some email platforms. It allows you to improve customer engagement through better interactions and faster responses.

What do you dislike about NEON-dX?
Customer support via chat and email is relatively poor. On the other hand, data export is not always efficient.

Recommendations to others considering NEON-dX:
If you are looking for an intuitive, efficient, and easy-to-use tool for your marketing goals, this is the right solution.

What problems is NEON-dX solving and how is that benefiting you?
It provides excellent analytical tools to follow the behavior of the business. Include automated options in marketing metrics. The software dashboard is intuitive and easy to use.
